title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or Docker command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama’s REST API, published to npm.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama, packaged as a Docker image.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, written in Python.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await and System.Text.Json support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models privately.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that plugs into any Ollama model.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted note writing using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node that adds Ollama chat and embedding actions to workflows.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client library for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming support.
